definition: a wandering or disorderly grouping (of things or persons), go, come, or spread in a rambling or irregular way
details:
noun
- a wandering or disorderly grouping (of things or persons)
= example: a wandering or disorderly grouping (of things or persons)
verb
- go, come, or spread in a rambling or irregular way
= synonyms: sprawl
- wander from a direct or straight course
= synonyms: sidetrack
